import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Row, Col, Button, Alert, Container, Label } from "reactstrap"; // availity-reactstrap-validation import { AvForm, AvField } from "availity-reactstrap-validation"; // action import { registerUser, registerUserFailed, apiError, } from "../../store/actions"; // Redux import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; // import images import logodark from "../../assets/images/logo-dark.png"; class RegisterAuthor extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { email: "", username: "", password: "", }; this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(event, values) { this.props.registerUser(values); } componentDidMount() { this.props.registerUserFailed(""); this.props.apiError(""); document.body.classList.add("auth-body-bg"); } render() { return (

Register Your Author Account

{/* {this.props.user && ( Registration Done Successfully. )} {this.props.registrationError && ( {this.props.registrationError} )} */}

By registering you agree to the Nazox {" "} Terms of Use

Already have an account?{" "} Login

); } } const mapStatetoProps = (state) => { const { user, registrationError, loading } = state.Account; return { user, registrationError, loading }; }; export default connect(mapStatetoProps, { registerUser, apiError, registerUserFailed, })(RegisterAuthor);
